data.title: Domenic Koch Obituary - Battle Creek, Michigan
data.meta_description: Domenic Michael Koch, 8, of Battle Creek, Michigan, went to be with his Mother in Heaven on Friday, April 27, 2018 at home surrounded by his family. He was born on November 10, 2009, the son of Michael Allen Koch and Samantha Ann (Moore) Koch.    Domenic was a bright, intelligent 1st grade student at Beadle Lake Elementary School. He enjoyed going to school and playing with his friends.    Domenic is survived by his Father, Michael Koch, Sister, Katarina Ann Moore, Two Brothers, Marcus Allen and Jeremiah Alexander Koch, Grandfather, Gary (Rose) Koch, Uncle, Christopher (Michelle) Koch, Aunt, Virginia Braham, Special Friend's, Nicole Darling and Grandma Lorrie, Domenic's Teacher, Karen Strombeck, and a host of other family and friends. He was preceded in death by his Mother, Samantha Ann Koch.    Domenic loved Star Wars, playing video games, running around and playing as a little boy should. He loved being outside, camping, and spending time with his family. He enjoyed doing crafts, playing pranks on his dad, and making people laugh. Domenic was an energetic little boy that just liked to have fun, and enjoy life. He will be greatly missed by those lives that he touched during his short stay on earth.    Visitation will be held at the Baxter Funeral & Cremation Service, 375 W. Dickman Road, on Friday, May 4, 2018 from 4:00 - 4:30 pm.    A funeral service will immediately follow the visitation starting at 4:30 pm on May 4, 2018.    Light snacks will be provided afterwards to share memories and stories with the family about Domenic.   Memorials may be made to the Family of Domenic.   Arrangements by the Baxter Funeral & Cremation Service. 269-788-9800. www.baxterfuneral.com
